        public void setVideoFrameListener(VideoOverlayLayer.VideoFrameListener l)

      • getFrameBounds

        public boolean getFrameBounds(GeoPoint ul,
                              GeoPoint ur,
                              GeoPoint lr,
                              GeoPoint ll)
        get the frame bounds for the image. All of the GeoPoints passed in must be mutable.
        Parameters:
        ul - upper left mutable geopoint
        ur - upper right mutable geopoint
        lr - lower right mutable geopoint
        ll - lower left mutable geopoint
        Returns:
        false if there was an issue setting the geopoints, true if there was no issue.
